0.text: Innate: Qiyana's basic attacks and damaging abilities deal 15 − 83 (based on level) (+ 55% bonus AD) (+ 30% AP) bonus physical damage to affected enemies.

1.text: This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.

2.text: Royal Privilege's  cooldown is reset on all targets upon changing an  Element.

0.text: Active: Qiyana slashes forward in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies in a line, reduced to 75% damage against targets beyond the first.

1.text: Upon gathering an element with  Terrashape, Edge of Ixtal is upgraded to Elemental Wrath and its  cooldown is reset.

0.text: Active: Qiyana consumes her current Element and  hurls her blade in the target direction, detonating in a line upon colliding with an enemy or reaching maximum range, and triggering a bonus effect based on the consumed Element.

1.text: Enemies struck by the blade are dealt physical damage, reduced to 75% against subsequent units beyond the closest.

2.text: Brush: The blade raises a grass trail behind Qiyana that travels forth, lasting for 3.5 seconds and granting Qiyana  invisibility and  20% bonus movement speed until she attacks, casts an ability other than  Terrashape, or exits the trail.

3.text: River:  Roots enemies hit for 0.5 seconds, then  slows them by 20% for 1 second.

4.text: Terrain: Enemies hit while below  50% of their maximum health are dealt  bonus damage.

2.marker: «Total Damage to targets beyond the first:

0.text: Passive: While holding an Element, Qiyana gains  bonus attack speed,  25 bonus attack range, bonus magic damage on her basic attacks and basic abilities, and out-of-combat  bonus movement speed while moving near the Element currently being held.

1.text: Active: Qiyana  dashes towards the target location while gathering an Element of the nearest  Brush,  River or  Terrain she targeted, enchanting her blade.

2.text: A target Element is required to cast this ability.

3.text: Once Terrashape has been learned, Qiyana is automatically given the  Terrain element upon respawning.

0.text: Active: Qiyana  dashes a fixed distance towards the target enemy, dealing them physical damage if they are still in range upon arrival.

1.text: Qiyana can cast any of her abilities during Audacity. Casting  Edge of Ixtal while Audacity is targeting a champion will autonomously aim at them.

0.text: Active: Qiyana sends a windblast in the target direction that  knocks back all enemies within its path and stops upon hitting terrain.

1.text: The windblast then creates an erupting shockwave across any River or Brush it passes through, as well as around the borders of terrain it reaches, dealing physical damage to all enemies struck, with the percentage damage capped against  monsters,  stunning them for 0.5 − 1 (based on proximity) seconds, and granting  sight of the area along its path each for 0.75 seconds.

1.concerningText: Active: Qiyana slashes forward in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies in a line, reduced to 75% damage against targets beyond the first.

3.concerningText: Passive: While holding an Element, Qiyana gains  bonus attack speed,  25 bonus attack range, bonus magic damage on her basic attacks and basic abilities, and out-of-combat  bonus movement speed while moving near the Element currently being held.

4.concerningText: Active: Qiyana  dashes a fixed distance towards the target enemy, dealing them physical damage if they are still in range upon arrival.

0.concerningText: Active: Qiyana slashes forward in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies in a line, reduced to 75% damage against targets beyond the first.

Passive: While holding an Element, Qiyana gains  bonus attack speed,  25 bonus attack range, bonus magic damage on her basic attacks and basic abilities, and out-of-combat  bonus movement speed while moving near the Element currently being held.

Active

Unique – Sandswipe: Dash in a line through the target enemy champion's location, and upon completing the dash, deal 65 (+ 25% bonus AD) physical damage to the target and increase your damage dealt to them by 15% for the next 3 seconds (90 second cooldown; 500 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – SANDSWIPE:  Dash in a line through the target enemy champion's location, and upon completing the dash, deal 65 (+ 25% bonus AD) physical damage to the target and increase your damage dealt to them by 15% for the next 3 seconds (90 second cooldown; 500 range).
